data.actual_result: After fullscreening, it shows back camera view and flash is set to Auto again
data.expected_result: Fullscreening should preserve the state of camera switch and flash
data.short_description: Fullscreening the in-app camera doesn't preserve camera switch and flash state
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any text channel and tap the attachments button (+)  - Navigate to the in-app camera tab - Switch to selfie mode - Change the flash state (from Auto to Off or On) - Tap the fullscreen button
